subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic overcame Jo-Wilfried Tsonga to reach the final of the Mubadala Championship in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, for the third time in three years.
snippet: Novak Djokovic overcame Jo-Wilfried Tsonga to reach the final of the Mubadala Championship in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, for the third time in three years.
